twitch_info.title: Highlight: 243+ Hours of Enhanced Interrogation Techniques

message.body: haha u died lorema2SMOREc
but I'm learning
it's all part of the learning experience
no dying is bad lorema2SMOREc
"Failure is good really." - Losers
LUL
sounds like a WaPo article
I'm not as good as people like you or jr who never die
seriously though are you getting closer to a full x0.9 clear?
Appropriated? D:

well, I'm getting closer to being able to beat the game on 1.0 speed, that is 100% accurate. But I will never actually try to clear the game on 0.9 speed itself because that's not my goal, it's just prep for 1.0
xoryla beat the game about 9 months after he started playing, I am on month 6 or 7, I forget
I do not know him. But you are better than him.
no way
he beat DS already
there is no way I can be better right now
You are better than him right up until you cross the 10 month mark.
Keepo
looks like the terrain generation thing will work pretty smoothly
didn't take me long to figure out what I did before in Bonehammer
that's good
but I've got to enter in all the data now
oh geez
that's always torture
yeah that'll take a minute
I can't believe how shameless MW fans are
every step of the way they're like "THERE'S GAME BREAKING THING YOU SHOULD GO GET"
fucking ridiculous
such awful design
only awful players would ever appreciate it
it's the only way to make that game bearable
it's just a twisted way of coping with the shittiness of the game
actually Morroblivion is pretty cool
well, it fixes some serious issues
it's the fun of being in an interesting province without the _horrible_ mechanics of MW
the movement speed alone makes a world of difference
is there accuracy?
or does every attack hit
I don't think so
well some of the hitboxes are really broken
then it's basically like morrowind unity Kappa
it really is
but more unfinished
fixes all the things I hated about MW
all?
what about the fixed item placements?
I don't remember them so it isn't an issue
I just can't fathom anyone who thinks leaving Daedric Daikatanas lying on the floor surrounded by neutral mobs is a good thing
and of course they always try to pull the old
"The game you say you hate is really like the game you love! Gotcha!"
someone actually compared it to Dark Souls because fixed items
which, I don't need to tell you, is absurd
LUL
that's really pathetic
MW's item placement is like if the Blue Tearstone ring behind the Black Knight in Undead Burg was a fully upgraded Black Knight weapon
you just run past the knight and get one of the strongest weapons in the game, don't even need to fight him
yeah, basically
also, the BK weapon would be enchanted so you could use it right away regardless of stats
Morrowsouls
I wonder how elden ring does it
and I'm surprised Johnny likes that game so much given how he is always ranting about rng
since it's open world dark souls
yet MW is rng city
probably a mix of fixed and random
I didn't know johnny liked it
seems insane
yeah
the accuracy is just masochistic
earlygame
but talking to Johnny has given me a lot of ideas about how we can make very different crowds happy
yeah in MW you have 2 choices: walk around killing crabs and rats until your hit rate rises, or break the game with stupid shit and become a god
I did the second then quit
it was boring
but the former is just boring and slower
Morroblivion actually makes it bearable
you're SO fast compared to the original game
yeah, you're probably twice as fast
or more
I'm faster sneaking in MB than running in MW
honestly, even after doubling my speed in morrowind with the console, I still felt slower than oblivion
or was it tripling LUL
yeah and your Fatigue runs out after only a few steps
and your Fatigue affects every roll you take so if you're out of breath when a guar attacks you, you're finished
it's perfect
but morroblivion fixes that?
yeah
you don't get tired from moving
and they fixed the ridiculous hand to hand system
how did it work in MW?
your fists damage the enemies' Fatigue directly, no health damage
when they ran out of fatigue, they fell down
if you punch them while they have 0 fatigue, THEN you damage their health
but if they regen 1 fatigue, it doesn't carry over
your next punch brings them to 0, the punch after that damages them
so you have to beat someone in an MMA ground-pound for half an hour
LUL
and of course enemies use it on you and it takes forever to die
I feel like you know more about morrowind than most morrowind fans
I'm certain of it
it's kind of biblical
yeah exactly
I've played every entry pretty thoroughly
some MW fans don't know that there's scaling
even the spinoffs? or just main series?
they think that meeting a rat in the wilderness at level 1 and meeting a Golden Saint in the same location at a high level is just a random thing
never played Redguard or Battlespire but I'm seen longplays of them
with morroblivion skywind really wouldn't be much of an improvement it seems
yeah idk what the respective levels of pregress are with each project
the main thing is these guys need to learn to code
they don't know how to change mechanics
we made a spellcrafting system in Skyrim in 1 day with an unfamiliar API
yet those Skyblivon/Skywind projects were around for years without spellcrafting
I can't remember how many of aristotle's works we have
and plato
who knows how much bullcrap of theirs we lost
I still need to read my Aristotle collection
already suffered through Plato
maybe Aristotle will be better
you know that old saying (not true actually) about Chinese having the same word for "crisis" and "opportunity" ?
yes
I'm hoping that the raise in rent will spark a blowout confrontation with the Beast so she either leaves or gets kicked out
like most things regarding east asia, it's just made up LUL
all we need is for her to get so mad that she insults the landlord's wife and it's a done deal
why would she do that?
the landlord's a really cool laid back old dude, and his wife isn't a total bitch or anything, but she can be really catty
the neighbor? because she lacks self control
I'm just not sure why she would insult the wife in particular instead of the landlord himself
I got advance warning, but she's likely to find out about the rate hike today
and oh man is it going to get dramatic around here
they run the business together
the wife is involved in much of the paperwork and legal stuff
the husband is the handyman
oh, so she's a landlady too
so there's a 50/50 chance that she'll talk to the wife about it
yeah
and if you get 2 women in a confrontation like that, it escalates quicly
*quickly
goes from 0 to soap opera in under a minute
the neighbor moving out would be so great
just amazing
do you really think it's 50/50 that the landlady comes by instead of the landlord, if the landlady is mostly in charge of the legal stuff?
when it comes to interfacing with tenants, they divide that up
I'm praying for you then
thanks
and then your QoL will go back to pre-beast days
oh yeah
it was so nice here
just the perfect life with no problems at all
then beasts and fires and refugees and inflation
everybody's fucking up my shit and I didn't do anything to them
that was just really unlucky
nothing makes me feel more stupid than bullet hell LUL
it's great
never boring
I'm going to do some 1.0
I'm playing very well today anyways
I meant
"not playing very well"
21 raiders from Mir_iw have joined!
gl
holy crap
thanks mir for the raid
oh shit hes not listening to lectures
is that good or bad?
yes
yes
it just means shit is real
it means I was playing badly earlier
and I just want to do 1.0 instead of practice LUL
clear today !
LUL
sup raker!
if I get a lobotomy and replace my brain with casualcrap's I can clear today
I thought, "aren;t people going to be bored watching me grind?"
then I realized these were hardened Mir viewers
they can handle anything
classic
time to finish that lecture
‚úèÔ∏è üóíÔ∏è
there is no final exam, don't worry
finally
0.9x clear from shower
o/
‚òéÔ∏è
damn
it's going to happen
in real attempts
I can feel it
what is real pb?
10 final deaths or something
real pb is walk or die I think
furthest I've fullcleared from is walk or die
that's like 1:10-end I think?
@Mastermaxify are you streaming soon?
I don't know your schedule
that's it for today
thanks for watching everyone
and thanks for the raid mir
KonCha
bye :)
